name: Butterflight
description:
[MOBILE ONLY]
Flying butterfly who is fighting with ants and their boss THE SPIDER.
! IF DOESN'T WORK go to: https://sirdomin.github.io/ to play in mobile browser!

CREATORS: Dominik Garbulski, Jakub Melkowski, Rafał Jaskulski, Łukasz Szadowski, Stanisław Rubaj.

On itch.io we've got a problem with screen orientation. Game is in the portrait mode but page load it in the horizontal one.
